emulator.name: Tecmo Classic Arcade (X-Box)
emulator.emulates: Classic Tecmo arcade games of the 80s and 90s!
emulator.comment: All of your old-school Tecmo favorites are back and available in this compilation for the Xbox(R), featuring the original football favorite, Tecmo Bowl! Enjoy 11 great classic games in all! Getting not so good reviews, how can a compilation that has Solomons Key, Bomb Jack and Rygar in it be bad?
